#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,i,n,k,s,x,j;
    cin>>t;
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        s=0;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            s=s+x;
        }
        if(s<=k)
        {
            cout<<"Yes"<<"\n";
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<"No"<<"\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
